rev.desc.rev.desc: Modification per CenterPoint Task 21674 for Request 22644:

Changed application to get data from probsummary file instead of problem file. See MSWord document named CtrPntTsk21674Rqs22644.doc attached to the CenterPoint request referenced above for details of what what done.
Call apm.edit.problem in browse mode not update.
